movie.title: Chaplin
movie.plot: An elderly Charlie Chaplin discusses his autobiography with his editor, recounting his amazing journey from his poverty-stricken childhood to world-wide success after the ingenious invention of the Little Tramp.
movie.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 16 nominations.

events.title: Charlie Chaplin receives a lifetime achievement award at the Oscars
